tasks.task_description: Clean up backend dependencies from package.json
Verify React Native app builds after backend removal
Remove MongoDB setup and test scripts
Clean up MongoDB dependencies and configurations
Update environment files to remove backend/DB variables
Remove database scripts from scripts directory
Clean up troubleshooting and development guides
Clean up Docker and CI/CD configurations

description: Complete SMARTIES backend cleanup tasks from .kiro/specs/08-backend-cleanup/tasks.md
context: Removed backend dependencies (express, cors, mongodb, nodemon) and backend scripts from package.json
Verified React Native app dependencies install successfully after backend removal
Removed MongoDB setup and test scripts: setup-mongodb-auth.js, test-mongodb-connection.js, start-local-mongodb.sh, setup-database.js, mongodb_atlas_setup.py, setup-local-db-simple.sh
Continuing MongoDB cleanup - already removed mongodb dependency from package.json
Updated environment files to remove MongoDB and backend server variables from .env, .env.example, .env.development, .env.production, .env.staging
Removed database-related scripts from scripts directory including load scripts, process scripts, and embedding scripts
Removed database-related test files including MongoDB connection tests, cloud integration tests, and embedding tests
Updated README.md to remove MongoDB references and update technology stack
Updated ARCHITECTURE_UPDATE_SUMMARY.md to reflect simplified architecture without backend/database components
Cleaned up troubleshooting guide by removing MongoDB references
Removed remaining database-related scripts from package.json
Removed docker-compose.yml file containing MongoDB service definitions
React Native app structure is intact - TypeScript compilation issues are configuration-related, not due to missing backend dependencies
Found remaining MongoDB references in .github/CONTRIBUTING.md and .kiro specs - these are historical/design documents that can remain for reference
Environment files validated - contain only necessary AI service and external API configurations, no backend/database variables remain
Cleaned up unused files including JSON data files, Python services, and attempted to remove unused directories
Created comprehensive cleanup completion documentation in BACKEND_CLEANUP_COMPLETE.md
